New Records: Brooks Lee had five RBIs in the game
Carlos Santana went 3 for 4 with a two-run homer
Key Match Events: The Twins scored eight times in the sixth and seventh innings to avoid a three-game sweep
Spencer Steer hit an RBI triple in the fourth and scored on Ty France's sacrifice fly
Pre-Game Insights: The Twins maintained a 2 1/2-game lead over Detroit and Seattle for the last AL wild card spot
Post-Match Reflections: Rookie Brooks Lee said 'Hittingâ€™s contagious. It always helps when there are guys on base'
Carlos Santana said 'Every day is a new day, a new game. Today is great. This is the game we need.'
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Twins play at Cleveland on Monday, starting a seven-game trip that ends in Boston
The Reds will start LHP Brandon Williamson against Atlanta on Tuesday
